subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Sidney Crosby had three assists to bring his N.H.L.-leading point total to 116, helping Pittsburgh to a 4-2 victory over the host Boston Bruins Thursday night.
snippet: Sidney Crosby had three assists to bring his N.H.L.-leading point total to 116, helping Pittsburgh to a 4-2 victory over the host Boston Bruins Thursday night.
